recipe_description: A classic Italian dish made with spaghetti and fresh tomato-based sauce.
ingredients: Spaghetti 1 kilo, Tomatoes 2 pieces, Garlic 2 cloves, Basil 5 leaves, Olive Oil 2 tbsp, Salt 1 tsp, Pepper 1/2 tsp

recipe_description: A healthy and light salad with grilled chicken and a lemon-olive oil dressing.
ingredients: Grilled Chicken Breast 200g, Mixed Greens 1 cup, Cherry Tomatoes 5 pieces, Cucumber 1 piece, Red Onion 1/2 piece, Olive Oil 1 tbsp, Lemon Juice 1 tbsp

recipe_description: A hearty vegetarian chili loaded with beans, vegetables, and spices.
ingredients: Kidney Beans 1 cup, Black Beans 1 cup, Corn 1/2 cup, Tomatoes 2 pieces, Bell Peppers 1 piece, Onion 1 piece, Garlic 2 cloves, Chili Powder 1 tbsp

recipe_description: A refreshing Greek salad with crisp vegetables and feta cheese.
ingredients: Cucumber 1 piece, Tomatoes 2 pieces, Red Onion 1/2 piece, Kalamata Olives 1/4 cup, Feta Cheese 100g, Olive Oil 1 tbsp, Oregano 1 tsp

recipe_description: A flavorful shrimp curry made with coconut milk and aromatic spices.
ingredients: Shrimp 300g, Coconut Milk 1 cup, Onion 1 piece, Garlic 2 cloves, Ginger 1 tbsp, Curry Powder 1 tbsp, Tomatoes 2 pieces, Cilantro a handful

recipe_description: Toasted baguette slices topped with a fresh tomato and basil mix.
ingredients: Baguette 1 loaf, Tomatoes 2 pieces, Garlic 2 cloves, Basil 5 leaves, Olive Oil 1 tbsp, Balsamic Vinegar 1 tbsp, Salt 1 tsp, Pepper 1/2 tsp

recipe_description: Baked mushrooms filled with creamy, garlicky cheese stuffing.
ingredients: Mushroom Caps 12 pieces, Cream Cheese 100g, Garlic 1 clove, Parmesan 2 tbsp, Bread Crumbs 2 tbsp, Parsley 1 tbsp, Olive Oil 1 tbsp

recipe_description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten center.
ingredients: Dark Chocolate 100g, Butter 100g, Eggs 2 pieces, Sugar 1/2 cup, Flour 1/4 cup, Vanilla Extract 1 tsp, Salt 1/4 tsp

recipe_description: Creamy cheesecake topped with fresh strawberries and a crumbly base.
ingredients: Cream Cheese 300g, Strawberries 1 cup, Graham Crackers 1 cup, Butter 50g, Sugar 1/2 cup, Vanilla Extract 1 tsp, Eggs 2 pieces
